data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Giurgiu, Romania that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Giurgiu, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Giurgiu, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Giurgiu, Romania.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Giurgiu a passion to plant another simple church.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Giurgiu
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who are far from you in Giurgiu. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Giurgiu, Romania has a population of 263,200.

We estimate Giurgiu has 16,660 people who might know Jesus, 229,842 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,698 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 229,842 people in the state of Giurgiu who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness
